website_summaries.verdict: Trusted by veterinarians, and made with fish, chicken, and yucca root for reducing some of your ferret’s infamous waste smell, Mazumi is an all-around quality ferret food.
pros: Poultry by-product meal, brown rice, and soybean meal are the first 3 ingredients
Contains fish oil for a healthy coat and skin
cons: We would prefer to see “chicken” as the main ingredient over “chicken by-product meal.”

customer_reviews.title: Do Some Research First Before You Buy This Stuff
customer_reviews.text: The first product is chicken by products. As if that were not bad enough, the second ingredient is brown rice and the third is soy. Someone please inform the manufacturer that cats are strict carnivores. Also the BHA used as a preservative is a known carcinogen. I purchased this ferret food because it appeared on a “top ferret food” review website. Boy do I feel stupid after reading the ingredients list! I tossed it and ordered Wysong Ferret Archetype. It is very expensive but is considered to have the best ingredients available including probiotics and vitamins. My ferrets are worth it and vet visits for sick ferrets are not cheap.
customer_reviews.author: OAP55

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I have used Mazuri in the past with lot of animals (mice, rats, guinea pigs) and been very satisfied, so I was disappointed and surprised to find that about two weeks after mixing this into my ferrets food their coats became brittle and rough, they lost weight and their stools became dark (not tarry, just dark like the food is dark). I switched the Mazuri out and their coats have since gone back to soft and their weight has evened out, though two have had poor sheds while on it. .
customer_reviews.author: Lupus

customer_reviews.title: Ferrets dig it so I do too!!!
customer_reviews.text: I’ll admit I was hesitant to switch to Mazuri as I’ve been a Ferrant for almost 15yrs & always taught to stick w/high end, real meat, no veggies/starches etc. food & was shocked when my vet recommended this to me after I read the ingredients! But honestly my 3 ferrets love it & haven’t seen any quality of life & or health related issues feeding them this vs. the “top tier“ More Dooks kibble I used for yrs..so im a fan! *Obviously every ferret is different but almost all are very picky/stubborn when it comes to food so def. check w/ur vet before making major changes*
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: My finicky fuzzies eat it up!
customer_reviews.text: I gave the flavor part of the review five stars, not because I eat it but because my ferrets like it, and they can be rather picky. This food is a fantastic value and I received it very quickly. Will definitely re-order.
customer_reviews.author: Bones6

customer_reviews.title: Pricy but totally worth it
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my babies once one of them developed a pancreatic insulinoma. Even the most premium cat foods that I had been feeding them with the highest protein had cranberry or something else sugary in it. The little buggers are picky & the seem to like it.
customer_reviews.author: Mickey

customer_reviews.title: Ferrets love this
customer_reviews.text: Ferrets love this stuff. Gained some weight and cost got better. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: yelena

customer_reviews.title: Good food, good price, wish had less grains
customer_reviews.text: Ferrets love this food but wish it had less grains in it. Wysong is grain free but was causing my ferrets to have crazy diarrhea so made the switch. Great price. Bag was ripped this time all my other orders have been fine though.
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: Ferrets love the stuff
customer_reviews.text: I do not see what makes my ferrets go crazy for this stuff. I tried some and wanted to gag. The tube rats think this is like caviar or something.
customer_reviews.author: Players Wanted Airsoft

customer_reviews.title: Worth Every Cent
customer_reviews.text: Great high end ferret food. It's important for optimal ferret health.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GREAT nutrition for Furry Ferrets
customer_reviews.text: Mixed 50/50 with previous food to transition. One week later choice eats plus weight gain and activity increase.
customer_reviews.author: RaieauX!

customer_reviews.title: The Ferrets love it and they are now at a healthy weight.
customer_reviews.text: I have two ferrets that could not seem to gain weight. After using this food they are now healthy and filled out like ferrets should be.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Nope
customer_reviews.text: Do not recommend this food. Ferrets lost weight and one ferret starting losing his hair. Put them on another food and they are doing much better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GOOD
customer_reviews.text: My fur babies love this ferret food! Even the cat was trying to chew a hole through the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Konyar

customer_reviews.title: Ferret says YUM
customer_reviews.text: My ferret LOVES this food. Ive gone through 3 different food companies and Zoey chose this one. Good quality food for a great price.
customer_reviews.author: David Gomez

customer_reviews.title: My ferret approves
customer_reviews.text: I mix this food with duck soup powder in warm water. My ferret loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Stemdar

customer_reviews.title: Love Mazuri for my babies but
customer_reviews.text: Love Mazuri but this is the third time I was sent Epigen food instead of the Mazuri I wanted. Three times!
customer_reviews.author: KGR

customer_reviews.title: They EAT It!! Sheba, pictured above just turned 10!!
customer_reviews.text: Have been using this for y ferrets for 30+ Years!!
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Nassetta

customer_reviews.title: Great ferret food and great sevice by the seller
customer_reviews.text: The Mazuri Ferret food is the best in the market, our order was deliverd very fast and the quality is great.
customer_reviews.author: TONY P.

customer_reviews.title: Great product, worth the value!
customer_reviews.text: Has a rich hearty smell and looks like rat droppings but my 3 fat boys and little girl love this :)
customer_reviews.author: Apollo Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Ferrets may love it, but it's poor ingredients.
customer_reviews.text: Soy has no place in a ferret diet, and is a legume, known to cause bladder stones. Same goes for peas, beans, chickpea, and sweet potato. Wysong Digestive Support is the recommended best food, and if only a Marshall brand is available, choose the Select Chicken. High quality food should not contain detrimental ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: Redheadfae

customer_reviews.title: One of The Best ferret kibbles
customer_reviews.text: This is a well balanced, nutritious kibble that my furkids enjoy in the mix I put together for them. They like it, it's good for them, we're happy.
customer_reviews.author: S. Sterling

product_meta.title: Mazuri Ferret Diet, 5 lb Bag
product_meta.description: Mazuri Ferret Diet offers proper ferret nutrition in an extruded form for all life stages of ferrets. This highly palatable, nutrient-dense dry ferret food contains multiple animal derived proteins appropriate for carnivores. Mazuri ferret food contains high quality ingredients for high digestibility. No ferret supplements are required with this ferret food.
feature_bullets: Multiple animal derived proteins appropriate for carnivores
Highly palatable and easy to digest
Moderate starch level - Less than 15% starch, more appropriate for carnivores
Contains fish oil as an Omega-3 fatty acid source and natural vitamin E.
Contains probiotics - To support GI tract health
